metadata.title: CVE-2018-14054 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A double free exists in the MP4StringProperty class in mp4property.cpp inMP4v2 2.0.0. A dangling pointer is freed again in the destructor once anexception is triggered.

criterions.comment: mp4v2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
